plot: On a bleak Edinburgh night, a turbulent couple's relationship reaches breaking point. As their hostility reaches a climax, their words set off an unseen chain of events that culminate in a devastating final blow.
title: Hit
plot_es: On a bleak Edinburgh night, a turbulent couple's relationship reaches breaking point. As their hostility reaches a climax, their words set off an unseen chain of events that culminate in a devastating final blow.
